title: Skoda gears up to introduce new Kodiaq, Octavia in India
description: Czech carmaker Skoda plans to launch new models in India, including the latest version of its premium SUV, Kodiaq, and a sub-4 meter compact SUV early next year. Skoda Auto India Brand Director Petr Janeba announced the re-introduction of the premium sedan Octavia later this year. The new Kodiaq is expected to arrive by the end of next year. Skoda aims to cater to SUV demand while also offering classic sedans like Octavia. The company also plans to introduce battery-electric models in India.
